name: Two Below
description:
In a remote town up in the mountains where the temperature can drop in a matter of seconds, the power has gone out.

 
  You have been entrusted with the task of scaling the nearby peak to fix the generators and restore power to the town before nightfall. 

Can you bring back the warmth to your town?

This was an entry to the Godot Wild Jam and was my first time using the Godot engine.   The theme of the jam was Assembly and I chose to use two of the wild cards as well

Wildcard one:   Four Colors Only

Wildcard two: Temperature 

for best text readability the  downloadable versions are recommended 

Note Before Playing: 
turn down the music in the options section, I did not have time to figure out how to set it on load, it will be fixed the next time I update the project.

There are a few bugs currently with the weather system and I had overscored for the time frame of the jam, but I look forward to updating this in the future.

   I had such a fun time with this jam and learning a new engine that I really want to make a new dev log video about it.
   if you are interested in seeing the video when it's done check out my YouTube channel the log should be up in a couple of weeks! 

                                                   Thanks for playing and take care!
